description:
Welcome to English Essentials.

This is where you will LEARN English FAST with EASY conversations - Limited Edition
Remember this is a Limited Edition Class!

Overcome your fear of speaking to anyone in English, and impress your family, friends and strangers that you meet with your polished English.

Take this Limited Edition Class Now!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We have eleven conversations you will have in your daily lives. These conversation include

  • Introducing yourself
  • Having a chat with your friends
  • Formally reporting a complaint about a product
  • and much more exciting conversations.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your first stop before you begin your journey with the English language.

Some of the features and benefits of this amazing course

  • The English Essentials is a library of simple English language courses to help you speak English well. Every course is designed on the conversation based model.
  • This course has a package of daily conversations that you can listen to and practice with like minded people to improve your own confidence in speaking English.
  • You can learn various phrases used to show many emotions. This increases the quality of the conversation you have.
  • This quick course consists of short 3 to 5 minute videos so that you can learn and practice whenever you are free or even binge watch at one go.
We are here to help your desire to learn English through our


  1. easy,
  2. light and
  3. as interesting modules.

So take this Limited Edition course NOW to start speaking English fluently and confidently anywhere you go.
title: Basic English Conversations to help you learn fast.
